search.name: French verbs conjugation
search.description:
Get the conjugation for a french verb.
Usage:
cjfr <verb> [/1] [/2] [/3]
Switches:
/1 - use web reference 1. Also gives useful notes (default).
/2 - use web reference 2. Also gives english equivalents.
/3 - use web reference 3. Quite roughly presented, but exhaustive, results.
Example:
cjfr vouloir /1 /3
